meanings.definition: The act of dividing a text into paragraphs.
meanings.sent1: Proper paragraphing helps readers follow the flow of a story.
meanings.sent2: I learned about paragraphing in my English class.
meanings.sent3: The teacher's paragraphing of the essay made it easy to read.
meanings.sent4: Her paragraphing was like neatly stacked building blocks of information.
meanings.sent5: Effective paragraphing breaks up long texts into manageable chunks.

meanings.definition: The practice of organizing written material into distinct sections for clarity and structure.
meanings.sent1: Good paragraphing makes a document easier to understand.
meanings.sent2: The book's paragraphing made it simple to locate specific information.
meanings.sent3: His paragraphing of the report was so precise, it looked like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The paragraphing in the article created a roadmap for the reader.
meanings.sent5: Clear paragraphing is essential for conveying ideas effectively.
